symptoms_responses.fever: A fever is a temporary increase in body temperature. Stay hydrated and rest well.
symptoms_responses.cold: A cold is a viral infection that affects your nose and throat. Drink warm fluids and rest.
symptoms_responses.headache: Headaches can be caused by stress, dehydration, or lack of sleep. Try to relax and stay hydrated.
symptoms_responses.cough: A cough might be due to allergies, infection, or irritation. Drink warm tea and avoid cold drinks.
symptoms_responses.stomach pain: Stomach pain can be caused by indigestion, acidity, or infection. Eat light and stay hydrated.
